languages.text: "Как пожелаете, Ваша Светлость. Отчет будет нерадостным — нам необходимо найти замену погибшему {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Навигатору{/g}. В обычных обстоятельствах это крайне, крайне сложно, однако... Бог-Император явно благоволит к вам. Как мы только что выяснили, в системе Райкад, находится станция {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Навис Нобилите{/g}. Подобные бастионы навигаторов — невообразимая редкость, и то, что мы оказались именно тут — невероятное совпадение, которое не объяснишь ничего, кроме как божественным вмешательством. Вам следует посетить станцию, Лорд-капитан, и подыскать замену".

traits.locale_text: "Как пожелаете, Ваша Светлость. Отчет будет нерадостным — нам необходимо найти замену погибшему {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Навигатору{/g}. В обычных обстоятельствах это крайне, крайне сложно, однако Бог-Император к нам благоволит. Прямо здесь, в системе Райкад, находится станция {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Навис Нобилите{/g}. Мы не могли найти лучшего места, где застрять без Навигатора. Вам следует посетить станцию, Лорд-капитан, и подыскать замену".

languages.text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The report will be far from cheering — we must find a replacement for the dead {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. This is a task that is extremely challenging even under normal circumstances, but the God-Emperor's blessing is clearly upon you. We have just ascertained that there is a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} station in the Rykad System. Such Navigator bastions are unbelievably rare, and our having ended up here is an incredible coincidence that can only be explained by divine intervention. You should visit the station, Lord Captain, and find someone to fill the vacant post."
languages.original_text: "Как пожелаете, Ваша Светлость. Отчет будет нерадостным — нам необходимо найти замену погибшему {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Навигатору{/g}. В обычных обстоятельствах это крайне, крайне сложно, однако... Бог-Император явно благоволит к вам. Как мы только что выяснили, в системе Райкад, находится станция {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Навис Нобилите{/g}. Подобные бастионы навигаторов — невообразимая редкость, и то, что мы оказались именно тут — невероятное совпадение, которое не объяснишь ничего, кроме как божественным вмешательством. Вам следует посетить станцию, Лорд-капитан, и подыскать замену".

traits.locale_text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The report will be far from cheering — we must find a replacement for the dead {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. This is a task that is extremely challenging even under normal circumstances, but the God-Emperor's blessing is clearly upon you. We have just ascertained that there is a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} station in the Rykad System. Such Navigator bastions are unbelievably rare, and our having ended up here is an incredible coincidence that can only be explained by divine intervention. You should visit the station, Lord Captain, and find someone to fill the vacant post."

"As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The report will be far from cheering — we must find a replacement for the dead {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. This is a task that is extremely challenging even under normal circumstances, but the God-Emperor's blessing is clearly upon you. We have just ascertained that there is a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} station in the Rykad System. Such Navigator bastions are unbelievably rare, and our having ended up here is an incredible coincidence that can only be explained by divine intervention. You should visit the station, Lord Captain, and find someone to fill the vacant post."

"As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The report will be far from cheering — we must find a replacement for the dead {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. This is a task that is extremely challenging even under normal circumstances, but the God-Emperor's blessing is clearly upon you. We have just ascertained that there is a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} station in the Rykad System. Such Navigator bastions are unbelievably rare, and our having ended up here is an incredible coincidence that can only be explained by divine intervention. You should visit the station, Lord Captain, and find someone to fill the vacant post."

"As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The report will be far from cheering — we must find a replacement for the dead {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. This is a task that is extremely challenging even under normal circumstances, but the God-Emperor's blessing is upon us, for there is a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} station in this very system. We could not have picked a better place to find ourselves without a Navigator. You should visit the station, Lord Captain, and find someone to fill the vacant post."

languages.text: “如您所愿，大人，接下来的报告恐怕并不会让人精神一振。我们必须为阵亡的{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}找到一位替代者。即便是在正常情况下，这也是个极具挑战性的任务。不过很显然，您得到了神皇的祝福，因为莱卡德星系刚好有个{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}导航宗族{/g}的星站。这样的导航者星站极其罕见，而我们却刚好找到了这样的地方，这是个令人难以置信的巧合，只能称之为神皇的指引。您应该去那座星站看看，找到导航者来填补我们的空缺，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The report will be far from cheering — we must find a replacement for the dead {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. This is a task that is extremely challenging even under normal circumstances, but the God-Emperor's blessing is clearly upon you. We have just ascertained that there is a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} station in the Rykad System. Such Navigator bastions are unbelievably rare, and our having ended up here is an incredible coincidence that can only be explained by divine intervention. You should visit the station, Lord Captain, and find someone to fill the vacant post."

traits.locale_text: “如您所愿，大人，接下来的报告并不会让人精神一振。我们必须为阵亡的{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}找到一位替代者。即便是在正常情况下，这也是个极具挑战性的任务。不过，神皇在上，这个星系中有个{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}导航宗族{/g}的星站。在没有导航者的情况下，我们只能去那个地方来寻找新的导航者了。您应该去那边看看，找个人来填补船上的空缺，舰长大人。”

languages.text: "Wie Ihr wünscht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Der Bericht wird alles andere als erfreulich sein – wir brauchen einen Ersatz für den toten {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. Das wäre unter normalen Umständen ausgesprochen schwierig, aber der Gottimperator meint es ganz offensichtlich gut mit Euch. Wir haben gerade bestätigt, dass es im Rykad-System eine Station der {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} gibt. Derartige Bastionen von Navigatoren sind unglaublich selten und dass wir ausgerechnet hier gelandet sind, ist ein unfassbarer Zufall, der sich nur durch göttliche Intervention erklären lässt. Ihr solltet die Station besuchen, Lord Captain, und jemanden für die offene Stelle finden."
languages.original_text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The report will be far from cheering — we must find a replacement for the dead {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. This is a task that is extremely challenging even under normal circumstances, but the God-Emperor's blessing is clearly upon you. We have just ascertained that there is a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} station in the Rykad System. Such Navigator bastions are unbelievably rare, and our having ended up here is an incredible coincidence that can only be explained by divine intervention. You should visit the station, Lord Captain, and find someone to fill the vacant post."

traits.locale_text: "Wie Ihr wünscht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Der Bericht wird alles andere als erfreulich sein – wir brauchen einen Ersatz für den toten {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, was selbst unter normalen Umständen extrem schwierig ist. Doch dank des Gottimperators befindet sich in diesem System eine Station der {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}. Wir hätten uns für den Verlust unserer Navigators keinen besseren Ort aussuchen können. Ihr solltet die Station besuchen, Lord Captain, und jemanden für die offene Stelle finden."

languages.text: « Comme il vous plaira, Votre Seigneurie. Ce rapport sera loin d'être réjouissant. Nous devons trouver un remplaçant pour notre {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g}, une tâche extrêmement difficile même en temps normal. Heureusement, il semble que la bénédiction de l'Empereur-Dieu vous accompagne. Nous venons de repérer une station de la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} dans le système de Rykad. Ces bastions des navigateurs sont extrêmement rares, et le fait que nous ayons atterri ici est une coïncidence si extraordinaire qu'elle ne peut s'expliquer que par une intervention divine. Vous devriez vous rendre à bord, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, et trouver une personne capable de reprendre ce poste. »
languages.original_text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The report will be far from cheering — we must find a replacement for the dead {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. This is a task that is extremely challenging even under normal circumstances, but the God-Emperor's blessing is clearly upon you. We have just ascertained that there is a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} station in the Rykad System. Such Navigator bastions are unbelievably rare, and our having ended up here is an incredible coincidence that can only be explained by divine intervention. You should visit the station, Lord Captain, and find someone to fill the vacant post."

traits.locale_text: « Comme il vous plaira, Votre Seigneurie. Ce rapport sera loin d'être réjouissant. Nous devons trouver un remplaçant pour notre {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g} décédé, une tâche extrêmement difficile même en temps normal. Heureusement, loué soit l'Empereur-Dieu, il existe une station de la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} dans ce système. Nous n'aurions pas pu trouver meilleur endroit pour nous retrouver à court de navigateur. Vous devriez vous rendre sur la station, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, et trouver une personne capable de reprendre ce poste. »

languages.text: 「仰せの通りに、陛下。残念ながら、明るい報告とは言えない状況です。我々は、亡くなった{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}の後任を見つけなければなりません。航宙士探しは通常でも困難を極めるのですが、あなたには間違いなく神帝陛下のご加護があるようです。ライカド星系に{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}航宙貴族{/g}のステーションがあることを確認しました。このような航宙士の拠点に出会うことは極めて稀で、ここへたどり着けたのは信じられないほどの偶然、神の介入があったとしか思えません。ロード・キャプテン、このステーションを訪れて、空いたポストを埋める人材を見つけてはいかがでしょうか」
languages.original_text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The report will be far from cheering — we must find a replacement for the dead {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. This is a task that is extremely challenging even under normal circumstances, but the God-Emperor's blessing is clearly upon you. We have just ascertained that there is a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} station in the Rykad System. Such Navigator bastions are unbelievably rare, and our having ended up here is an incredible coincidence that can only be explained by divine intervention. You should visit the station, Lord Captain, and find someone to fill the vacant post."

traits.locale_text: 「仰せの通りに、陛下。残念ながら、明るい報告とは言えない状況です。我々は、亡くなった{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}の後任を見つけなければなりません。航宙士探しは通常でも困難を極めるのですが、あなたには間違いなく神帝陛下のご加護があるようです。ライカド星系に{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}航宙貴族{/g}のステーションがあることを確認しました。このような航宙士の拠点に出会うことは極めて稀で、ここへたどり着けたのは信じられないほどの偶然、神の介入があったとしか思えません。ロード・キャプテン、このステーションを訪れて、空いたポストを埋める人材を見つけてはいかがでしょうか」

languages.text: «Como desee, mi{mf|lord|lady}. El informe no será en absoluto alentador: necesitamos un sustituto para el {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navegante{/g} muerto. La tarea ya sería extremadamente difícil incluso en circunstancias normales. Pero, claramente, el Dios Emperador le favorece: acabamos de confirmar la presencia de una estación de la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} en el sistema Rykad. Estos bastiones de navegantes son algo nada común, así que el haber acabado aquí es una coincidencia tan fortuita que solo puede atribuirse a la intervención divina. Lord Capitán, debería visitar la estación para encontrar a alguien capaz de ocupar el puesto».
languages.original_text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The report will be far from cheering — we must find a replacement for the dead {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. This is a task that is extremely challenging even under normal circumstances, but the God-Emperor's blessing is clearly upon you. We have just ascertained that there is a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} station in the Rykad System. Such Navigator bastions are unbelievably rare, and our having ended up here is an incredible coincidence that can only be explained by divine intervention. You should visit the station, Lord Captain, and find someone to fill the vacant post."

traits.locale_text: «Como desee, mi{mf|lord|lady}. El informe no será en absoluto alentador: necesitamos un sustituto para el {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navegante{/g} muerto, una misión extremadamente difícil incluso en circunstancias normales. Pero, gracias al Dios Emperador, hay una estación de la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} en este mismo sistema. No podríamos haber encontrado un lugar mejor para perder a nuestro Navegante. Lord Capitán, debería visitar la estación para encontrar a alguien capaz de ocupar el puesto».

languages.text: "Nasıl isterseniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Rapor pek iç açıcı olmayacak. Ölen {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı'nın{/g} yerine yenisini bulmamız gerek. Bu, normal koşullarda bile ziyadesiyle zor bir görev olsa da belli ki Tanrı İmparator'un lütfu sizinle. Zira az evvel Rykad Sistemi'nde bir {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} istasyonu olduğunu tespit ettik. Böylesi Rotacı kaleleri son derecede enderdir ve kendimizi burada bulmamız da ancak ilahi müdahale ile izah edilebilecek akıl almaz bir tesadüftür. İstasyonu ziyaret etmeli ve boşalan mevkiyi dolduracak birini bulmalısınız Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The report will be far from cheering — we must find a replacement for the dead {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. This is a task that is extremely challenging even under normal circumstances, but the God-Emperor's blessing is clearly upon you. We have just ascertained that there is a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} station in the Rykad System. Such Navigator bastions are unbelievably rare, and our having ended up here is an incredible coincidence that can only be explained by divine intervention. You should visit the station, Lord Captain, and find someone to fill the vacant post."

traits.locale_text: "Nasıl isterseniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Rapor pek iç açıcı olmayacak. Ölen {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı{/g}'nın yerine yenisini bulmamız gerek. Bu, normal koşullarda bile ziyadesiyle zor bir görev olsa da belli ki Tanrı İmparator'un lütfu sizinle. Zira az evvel Rykad Sistemi'nde bir {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} istasyonu olduğunu tespit ettik. Böylesi Rotacı kaleleri son derecede enderdir ve kendimizi burada bulmamız da ancak ilahi müdahale ile izah edilebilecek akıl almaz bir tesadüftür. İstasyonu ziyaret etmeli ve boşalan mevkiyi dolduracak birini bulmalısınız Lord Kaptan."
